Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Central
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Austin, 55th, Laramie and Archer: due to, street blockage near Archer/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Howard
ShortDescription: Red Line Line trains are standing due to a track switching problem near Howard. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line Line trains are standing due to a track switching problem near Howard. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#151 Sheridan

#96 Lunt

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Howard and Wilson in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
